SageTVPlugin.Name: Phoenix Fanart for SageTV
SageTVPlugin.Description: Uses fanart from the Phoenix API central fanart repository in the default SageTV Version 7.1 UI. *** This plugin is a MERGE and REPLACEMENT for the Phoenix Fanart for SageTV V7 by bialio and Phoenix Fanart for Malore Menus by tmiranda, Tiki ***
SageTVPlugin.Author: JREkiwi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.0.8.3 Change download to GitHub 1.0.8.2 Fix Java Dependency
1.0.8.1 Change download to HTTPS
1.0.8 Change to Display art in the preview area when using Diamond and backgrounds are disabled Add/Fix Backgrounds/Posters in playback Info popup Add Music Fanart on most panels
1.0.7 Initial Music Fanart support. (Backgrounds and Thumbnails in Album Detail)
1.0.6 Added option to control banner display in description area and show list and in malore menus (like Fuzzy's malore mods)) Added poster in DVD info popup Fix black spot in preview area Rewrite fanart selection code to be more flexible with finding banners etc. Fix issues with preview area in Upcoming Movies when a background exists Add art in favorite previous/future airing display Various other things I found as I worked through the code
1.0.5 Improve scrolling of videos when posters are enabled Added display of posters in Video Detail for DVDs Fix not displaying preview window fanart in Program Guide if full screen backgrounds is disabled Fix reflection display a different image sometimes Rework malore preview display area code
1.0.4 Fix missing Preview fanart for movies that had the Movie category removed by BMT processing Fix missing thumbnail in preview area if no other fanart exists Fix default background for Videos
1.0.3 Added option to not scale backgrounds and posters Change Poster default scaling Added display of banners for folders Added option for preference for display in preview area for folders, Banners, Background, Episode Fanart Change to use Episode specific fanart in Detailed info if available
1.0.2 Change background processing for EPG and Scheduled Recordings for smoother scrolling Change so that if Diamond is enabled, use the Diamond thumbnails and backgrounds
1.0.0 Merged bialio's Phoenix Fanart for SageTV and tmiranda's Phoenix Fanart for malore Menus Fixes for changes in the default STV Added optional background in detailed info panels Added optional background in EPG and Scheduled Recordings panels Scaling and caching based on UI resolution
